app.loginClosed: Login servers went down or closed, probably because of server restart, wait 5 minutes
app.loggedInFromAnotherSource: Someone logged in on to this character from another source. Session lost.

home.earlyAccessExplanation: This is a fan / hobby made game, done by one person and is currently in Open Alpha access.
home.feature1Title: Idle & inremental text MMORPG - hunt and do quests
home.feature1Description: Start with nothing and grow your character or many characters at the same time. Be whatever you want. Participating in what matter and let your character level up for you by hunting offline while still getting XP. Create party with your friends or control full party yourself. Do quests, be that of daily or story driver.
home.feature2Title: Level up your character and make unique build
home.feature2Description: There are no limits to stats and skills. You can create whatever you want. You want to go with meta? Go ahead and speak with other players what work best. But don't want to be as everyone else and want to do intelectual Knight with ton of mana? Go ahead. Want to do very bulky Mage or Healer? Sure, go crazy.
home.feature3Title: Don't go on adventure alone, it's dangerous
home.feature3Description: Either you want to create party with random people, your best friends or play alone as a full party team. All is possible. Play this game how you want. Min/Maxing is not the point. Party play is what important, this is what MMO is about. You won't survive alone or only with one character. You can create up to 10 characters on one account that share the same storage.
home.feature4Title: Don't like to hunt? Become a crafter.
home.feature4Description: Items wear out and break. Someone need to fix them. Items are not magically appearing in NPC stored. Someone need to create them and this someone can be you. Become the best crafter the world might know. Buy materials from adventurers and hunters. Create weapon, create armor, create potion, No loot item is useless as you can transmute them into what you might need.
home.feature5Title: Travel the map and face challenges in the dungeon.
home.feature5Description: Travel and explore the world, hunt stronger monster, get materials from them and sell them to Merchants. They will craft better gear for you instead. When dwelling the dungeons - don't get lost.
home.feature6Description: Buy and sell stuff and lead the economy of the world by opening you shops in each city. You're in control of the prices. You're in control of the goods. If money making is your call, this is the road for you! Also, trade with players in real time.
home.serverDown:
Our servers are currently down
Retrying in

characterSelect.youAreGuestAccount: You are on guest account, your data can be easily lost if you like the game consider registering account by clicking here
characterSelect.deleteCharacterConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this character? Type "DELETE" in uppercase letter to confirm.
characterSelect.nameIncorrect: Name is incorrect, use normal letters and symbols
characterSelect.sessionExpired: Your session expired, please reload the app

chat.needBasicLevel: Need Basic Skill {level} to use chat

craft.youAreCrafting2: at the moment. Your chance for success is
craft.abandonCraftExplanation: You can abandon your work, but you will not recover any materials and will not get any experience

map.overweight: Character is overweight, you can not travel to another location. Your character need to be below 90% of weight. Discard some items, use them or give it to someone else.

hunt.huntConfigExplanation: This is a place where you pre-configure the fights for your character, you might do it even during the fight, but it will not take effect until your turn in the hunt
hunt.huntConfigStartingPositionExplanation: is a position your character starts at the beginning of the round (currently ineffective)
hunt.huntConfigEscapeSituationExplanation: allow you to set up scenario when to run away by using Butterfly Wing away from the battle. It will use Butterfly Wing per each escape. If you will run out of them it will not work.
hunt.huntConfigHealingItemsExplanation: is what kind of healing items your character will use to restore HP. If there will no such items in the bag, character will not restore HP.
hunt.huntConfigManaItemsExplanation: is what kind of healing items your character will use to restore MP. If there will no such items in the bag, character will not restore MP.
hunt.huntConfigAmmoExplanation: This is solely for Archer and Thief jobs. You need to specify which arrows are going to be used as priority and which are secondary after the first are used up. If your character out of pre-configured arrows it will use basic melee attack
hunt.huntConfigActiveSkillsExplanation: are a rotation of skills per every 5 rounds. Skill placed in the first slot will trigger on 1st round, 6th, 11th, 16th etc.
hunt.useWhileMpHigher: Use while MP is higher than
hunt.useWhenHpLower: Use when HP is lower than
hunt.huntConfigTargetPriorityExplanation: In case you're a range character, you can select which your target your character try to prioritize. For example backline in case you reach them. In case it's not possible target is selected at random.
hunt.notInRangeActionExplanation: Select what to do in case character is out of XP, Mana or Arrows. Should character advance into melee range, or sit back and recover mana. Idling recover mana faster than normal attacks.

itemInfo.confirmationToDiscard: Are you sure you want to discard this item?
itemInfo.confirmationToRepair: Do you wish to use those materials in order to repair the item?

kafra.youWishToResetStats: You wish to rebuild your body? It is possible, but it is very expensive alchemical potion and overall magical procedure. It will cost you a good amount of zeny. Your body normally can witstand it multiple time, but the more you grow the more expensive it will become. So you should rely on it too much.
kafra.resetBeyond: You have grown beyond our magic and alchemy to rebuild you the way you want. Sorry.
kafra.youWishToResetSkills: You wish to rebuild your mental state? It is painful, ever heard about lobotomy? Well it's not that, but never the less, changing your mental state even by using magic is really hard. The more experience you gain, the more problems it will cause. Until the point of no return is reached.
kafra.insufficientZenyForBarber: Insufficient Zeny to use Barber Shop Service
kafra.insufficientZenyForStorage: Insufficient Zeny to use Kafra Storage Service
kafra.needBasicLevel: You need basic level {level} to start using Kafra Storage Services

puzzle.randomChallengeText1: You're feeling a bit lost, just some parts of the dungeon feels familiar, you are tried hard to navigate your way into the depths of this place. As if there is some kind of puzzle that need to be solved?
puzzle.randomChallengeText2: You've reached the stairs to the next level, at least that is what you think, but there are more stairs leading down, which one to choose? You need to solve this puzzle somehow.
puzzle.randomChallengeText3: Are you on the right path? You were sure that you memorized the map of the dungeon very well before dwelling into it.
puzzle.leaderNavigating: Leader is navigating your party through the dungeon and seems to be lost. It is a very fascinating scene, looking how yours leader might trying to connect dots and pieces of the map.

shop.shopClosureDaysExplanation: You can specify in what amount of days your shop should close. Leave it at 0 if it should be indefinite or until all items are sold.
shop.inWhatDayShopClose: In what amout of days shop will close
shop.openShopPresentYourself: What people see on the market list, make yourself presentable or show what are you selling. Equipment? Potions? Loot?
shop.rentExplanation: There is a flat price per day that you need to pay for the rent to {location}. It gets deducted every day. If it reaches amount that you won't be able to afford to pay the rent, shop will be closed, remaining zeny will be lost and all remaining items will be sent to Kafra.

stats.errorTryingToUpdateStats: Something went wrong while trying to update your stats
stats.strExplanation:
This stat affects the physical power (P.Atk) of the character, be that of melee or range, melee benefit more from Strength than range.
Primary stat for jobs: Fighter, Thief
Secondary stat for jobs: Merchant
stats.dexExplanation:
This stat affect character HIT(Accuracy) and EVA(Evade) parameters. This stat affects the speed of how fast character can finish missions and travel. Speed affects whole party. This stat affect physical power of the character by a little. Range weapons benefit more from this stat.
Primary stat for jobs: Archer, Thief
stats.intExplanation:
This stat affects the mental power (M.Atk) of the character, allowing to deal massive magic damage
Primary stat for jobs: Mage
stats.vitExplanation:
This stat affects the physical defense (P.Def) and HP and is a mandatory stat for protectors
Secondary stat for jobs: Fighter
stats.wisExplanation:
This stat affects the healing capabilities of acolyte, magical defense (M.Def) and MP
Primary stat for jobs: Acolyte
Secondary stat for jobs: Mage
stats.lukExplanation:
This stat affects the luck of a character and every other stat and attribute in many ways, primarily it is used for crafts, crit chance defense and crit chance attack
Primary stat for jobs: Merchant
Secondary stat for jobs: Thief, Archer

trade.wouldLikeToTrade: would like to trade with you
trade.noPlayersOnLocation: No players on the location to trade

tutorial.tutorialText1: Hey there, you seems to be new here. Let me show you around really fast for you not to get lost from the very beginning.
tutorial.tutorialText2: This is your general user interface and this small screen is how this game runs, it is optimized for mobile play. And you know about "Early Access" games? Well this one is Early Early Access game! So please be patient when playing it. And in case you have great idea - send it to developer on discord or you want to say that this game is shit? Also do it on discord, apreciated any way!
tutorial.tutorialText3: This is your main character info, it will be with you through all out the game, so you could see everything what is happening with your character or in case you're traveling or hunting
tutorial.tutorialText4: This is your party screen. Party doesn't work at the moment, expect it to start functionining in the release of 0.3
tutorial.tutorialText5: This is your settings and pre-hunt configuration. If music or sound too loud or annoying? You can turn it off in there. Or you can switch fast between your characters from here. And pre-hunt configuration is where you can pre-configure what your character is going to do and behave in the hunt (battles). Like what active skills to use (when you will have those) and what healing items to consume when low on HP/MP etc. Advance to frontlines or stay in the back, etc.
tutorial.tutorialText6: Here are your main game actions, they are used to hunt, to shop, to store items, save your location and basically for all random stuff in the game
tutorial.tutorialText7: Your chat. Chat is NOT persistent meaning you will lose all of chat logs on page refresh. Regular chat to talk with players. System chat for messages like what you used, what you equiped, sold, error messages and Battle chat for battle logs.
tutorial.tutorialText8: In the bottom here you will find everything related to your character. Equipment, stats, skills, attributes and everything character related. Map, to travel places. Quest board - main line quests, job change quest (when you reach Job Level to 10), random daily quests that drop every day at 4:00 UTC. And finally inventory, your character's personal bag. In here you can see what are you carrying with you at the time, you can also use any healing items from it or discard items from your inventory, but be careful, discarded items are lost forever
tutorial.tutorialText9: That is it. IMPORTANT! You should start with quests though, as there it explains you how to start playing in a bit of a narrative way. Also you will receive your first weapon! Good luck and thank you for playing!

party.huntTogether: Hunt together (if characters on same location they automatically join the hunt)
party.huntIndependence: Hunt independence (manual join is required from each member)
party.huntPreferencesCaution: With caution (hunt as less mobs as possible to be in advantage)
party.huntPreferencesYolo: YOLO leveling (gather every mob around the area, usually the amount of your party size)
party.travelIndependent: Travel independence. Travel as solo player independently from a party
party.travelTogether: Travel together. Travel together with same members in the same location. In this state party members must not craft, rest at inn or hunt. In this case error system message will be sent to the party.
party.travelTogetherIgnore: Travel together if possible. Travel together with same members in the same location. In case member is busy crafting, resting, hunting - party will travel anyway leaving out the members of the party who are busy.
party.needBasicLevelToOrganize: You need to have Basic Skill level {level} to organize party
party.needBasicLevelToJoin: You need to have Basic Skill level {level} to join party
party.typeNameToInvite: Type in name you want to invite to the team
party.confirmationToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the party?
party.confirmationToKick: Are you sure you want to kick this member out of the party?

settings.copyLinkToProfile: Copy link to your public profile
settings.linkToProfileCopied: Link to public profile copied to clipboard

transmute.itemTransmutationExplanation: Item transmutation is a skill that allow intelectual Alchemists, Wizards and Sages to transmute items of one kind to be converted into another. By decomposing it into protons and atoms and reconstructing it in the end. World is still opening new formulas, but general formulas to create the most required materials are well known and practised by a lot of Merchants and Mages.
transmute.formulasBelow: Below are the formulas that are available to you.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.fieldIsEmpty: One of the password fields is empty
changePassword.passwordIncorrectLength: Password must be at least {length} characters long
changePassword.passwordDoesNotMatch: New password and Confirm passwords does not match

ship.overweight: Character is overweight to a point where you can not even aboard the ship. Discard some items, put them in storage, use them or give it to someone else.
